info.name: Roblox Landing
info.description: Themes the rest of the Roblox website to resemble the landing page with a customizable background.
info.additionalInfo: [12/24/15]Update: Added option to display ads on the games page and fixed catalog search. I'm hesitant to write any styles while roblox is actively undergoing a redesign, but I was bored. Contact: You can message me at MrgamesNwatch with suggestions or issues. My Other Roblox Styles https://userstyles.org/styles/114764/roblox-improved https://userstyles.org/styles/118632/roblox-at-night-beta Unrelated, but while I have your attention checkout out my artwork. c: http://adidea.deviantart.com/
